b: when taken then become untweened next
when told by body inventory closed left then become untweened next
when told by body inventory closed right then become untweened next
when let go then become untweened next in 0.1s
when hit then become untweened next
when any part touched then add crumbles, then destroy all parts
when any part touched then play glass bottle smashing with low-pitch 60
when any part touched then play glass smashing with low-pass 300 very-varied-pitch
when any part touched then play glass fragment with high-pitch 200 varied-pitch
